9 minutes ago, Cheif Operations Director said:

Sometimes the pink markers go all the way to the top so to just keep my craft stable I need to counter it. Making it unflyable.

The pink markers are trim, which is applied by holding L1/LB while moving the stick. Essentially it's the same as trim on the PC, but now you have markers that show you've got trim applied. You can reset trim to 0 by holding L1/LB while clicking L3.

Oh... Ok thanks though. And what about when the indicators turn blue 

That's fine-control mode. You should still be able to control the craft, but the response will be much slower.

(edit: In cursor mode, it's toggled with LB+LS, which is the same as resetting trim in radial.)

1 minute ago, Cheif Operations Director said:

How to you disable that and is their a way to disable trim and fine tune completely so I can't accidently enable them

You can toggle fine-control off again using LB+LS in cursor mode. The indicators should go back to their normal orange colour. Unfortunately there is no way at present (on PC or console) to completely disable those functions.
